code: import axios from"axios";var url='/api/persons';var createPerson=function createPerson(personObject){var request=axios.post(url,personObject);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var getAllPersons=function getAllPersons(){var request=axios.get(url);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var deletePersonWithId=function deletePersonWithId(id){var request=axios.delete("".concat(url,"/").concat(id));return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var updatePersons=function updatePersons(id,personObject){var request=axios.put("".concat(url,"/").concat(id),personObject);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};export default{createPerson:createPerson,getAllPersons:getAllPersons,deletePersonWithId:deletePersonWithId,updatePersons:updatePersons};
